May 17, 03:07 UTC

End time : 30/05/2023 23:00 UTC

entry.title: [Global][Collaborative solutions] - Mailjet email pertubation
entry.content:
May 17, 12:55 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 03/04/2023 12:00 UTC
End Time : 25/04/2023 15:48 UTC
The monitoring period didn't spot any issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 25, 15:48 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams have implemented a workaround. Mailjet is currently functional.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Apr 17, 15:25 UTC
Update - Update : This issue is still ongoing with the technical teams and the partner.
Updates will be provided as soon as significant progress is made.

Apr 13, 08:25 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are still working with our partner regarding the incident.
Updates will be made as significant progress is made.

Apr 7, 15:00 UTC
Update - Update : Our technical teams always work with the partner to resolve the incident.
Workaround : Client can use the classic mail() php function instead of Mailjet. This enable to send mail again.

Update will be made as significant progress is made.

Apr 6, 18:02 UTC
Identified - Update : Our technical teams always work with the partner to resolve the incident.
Workaround : Client can use the classic mail() php function instead of Mailjet. This enable to send mail again.

Update will be made as significant progress is made.

Apr 6, 13:02 UTC
Update - Workaround : Client can use the classic mail() php function instead of Mailjet. This enable to send mail again.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue.
Update will be made as significant progress is made.

Apr 6, 12:21 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/04/2023 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Email send through a Mailjet server might be blocked.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be made as significant progress is made.
